id.aboutTXT-Adnan:
Halloww, namaku Adnan. Aku penggemar ilmu pengetahuan, terutama di bidang sains dan teknologi.

Fokusku sekarang adalah menjadi seorang Fullstack Developer dan Prompt Designer. Aku suka membedah, mengonfigurasi, memodifikasi, memperbaiki, dan merusak sumber kode, website, sistem hingga perangkat keras. Aku memulai karir di dunia programming sejak 3 Agustus 2023 dan mulai aktif di saat pertengahan tahun 2024.

Aku juga selalu berusaha tetap relevan dan tampil berbeda di saat banyak vibe coders tanpa substansi.

Mau kolaborasi proyek, diskusi ide, atau sekadar ngobrol santai. Bisa hubungi aku kapan saja!
id.PROGRAMMING-Text: Fullstack Development dengan fokus pada efisiensi backend dan interaktivitas modern.
id.AI-PROMPT-Text: Perancangan Prompt tingkat menengah untuk LLM dan integrasi API Kecerdasan Buatan.
id.SysNet-Text: Manajemen Server Linux, konfigurasi Arch/Debian, dan keamanan jaringan (CyberSec).
id.Pentest-Text: Saat ini, Hanya aku pergunakan untuk kepentingan ketahanan suatu sistem.
id.project1-text: Asisten personal open-source yang aku buat
id.project2-text: Portofolio minimalis untuk ayah aku. Ringan, cepat, dan dibangun hanya dengan HTML, CSS, serta JavaScript murni.
id.project3-text: Sistem monitoring server real-time. Menampilkan data CPU, RAM, dan storage secara akurat menggunakan Flask dan ApexCharts.
id.project4-text: Halaman khusus buat pasangan. Interaktif, cantik, dan cara unik untuk nunjukin rasa sayang.
id.project5-text: Platform manajemen kelas modern. Cepat berkat Vercel dan didukung database Supabase yang handal.
id.project6-text: Website restoran performa tinggi. Optimasi SEO bagus, pengalaman pengguna mulus, dan loading super cepat.
id.project7-text: Portal streaming anime modern. Desain responsif dan performa optimal dengan React, Vite, serta TailwindCSS.
id.project8-text: Bot Telegram yang responsif. Dibuat pakai Node.js agar latensinya sangat rendah.
id.project9-text: Eksperimen integrasi Groq API. Chat real-time super cepat berkat model LLM terbaru dari Groq.

en.aboutTXT-Adnan:
Hello, my name is Adnan. I am a fan of science, especially in the fields of science and technology.

My current focus is on becoming a Fullstack Developer and Prompt Designer. I enjoy dissecting, configuring, modifying, repairing, and breaking source code, websites, systems, and even hardware. I started my career in programming on August 3, 2023, and became active in mid-2024.

I also strive to stay relevant and stand out in a sea of coders without substance.

Whether you want to collaborate on a project, discuss ideas, or just chat casually, feel free to contact me anytime!
en.PROGRAMMING-Text: Fullstack Development focusing on backend efficiency and modern interactivity.
en.AI-PROMPT-Text: Intermediate Prompt Engineering for LLMs and Artificial Intelligence API integration.
en.SysNet-Text: Linux Server Management, Arch/Debian configuration, and Network Security (CyberSec).
en.Pentest-Text: Currently, I only use it for the sake of system security.
en.project1-text: Open-source personal assistant built to handle everyday tasks efficiently.
en.project2-text: Minimalist portfolio for my father. Lightweight and fast, built purely with HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.
en.project3-text: Real-time server monitoring system. Precise visualization of CPU, RAM, and storage data using Flask and ApexCharts.
en.project4-text: A dedicated page for my partner. Interactive, beautiful, and a unique way to express love.
en.project5-text: Modern classroom management platform. Powered by Vercel's speed and Supabase's reliable database.
en.project6-text: High-performance restaurant website. Optimized for SEO, smooth UX, and instant loading.
en.project7-text: Modern anime streaming portal. Fully responsive interface with maximum performance using React, Vite, and TailwindCSS.
en.project8-text: Responsive Telegram bot. Built with Node.js for ultra-low latency.
en.project9-text: Groq API integration experiment. Super-fast real-time chat powered by cutting-edge LLM technology.
